hero.megamix_description:
The biggest hits Born in Moldova from the last 25 years. 
Mega Mix — an hour where legendary songs will be brought back into the spotlight through live performances by artists on stage or through innovative digital showcases.

about.title: About Festival
about.description:
Do you love Moldova? You're not alone! You're of one of ours. 

Născut în Moldova is the Festival of Our Music. 
Its purpose is to inspire people to love Moldova.
 Regardless of ethnicity, language, religion, gender, or age, our people are united by a shared sense of home and a common cultural identity.

partners.description: Partners of the Born in Moldova Festival

faq.question: What is the refund policy?
faq.answer:
Refunds are available up to 7 days before the event. To request a refund:
  • Contact our support team
  • Provide your order number
  • State your reason for refund
After this period, tickets become non-refundable.

faq.question: What items are prohibited at the festival?
faq.answer:
The following items are not allowed:
  • Professional photo/video equipment
  • Food and drinks from outside
  • Glass containers
  • Weapons of any kind
  • Illegal substances
  • Drones or aerial equipment
  • Pets (except service animals)

faq.question: What time do the gates open?
faq.answer: Gates open at 16:00 each day. We recommend arriving early to avoid queues. Last entry is at 22:00.

faq.question: Is there parking available?
faq.answer:
Yes, there are two parking areas:
  • Main Parking (P1) - near the stadium entrance
  • Overflow Parking (P2) - 5 minutes walk
Parking fee is 50 MDL per day.

faq.question: Are children allowed at the festival?
faq.answer:
Yes! Children are welcome at the festival:
  • Ages 0-7: Free entry
  • Ages 8-12: Reduced price ticket required
  • Ages 13+: Full price ticket required
All children must be accompanied by an adult.

faq.question: What payment methods are accepted?
faq.answer:
We accept the following payment methods:
  • Credit/Debit cards
  • Cash (MDL only)
  • Mobile payments
  • Festival tokens
Note: Some vendors may only accept festival tokens.
